avalancheActivity.highlights: Not much snow in the area but the remaining snow is considered stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Not much snow in the area. The remaining snow is considered mostly stable after freeze/thaw cycles.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords. Small slabsl could be present in the north and Westfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords. Small slabsl could be present in the north and Westfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hæg breytileg átt og úrkomulítið um helgina. Snýst í V-átt á mánudag með dálitlum skúrum. Kólnar á sunnudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: There is some snow in the mountains but considered stable. Snow is in gullies and small slabs could be present.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow is generally considered stable in the area. Snow has accumulated in gullies and there are still possible windslabs high in starting zones and just below ridges. Little snow is at lower elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords. Small slabsl could be present in the north and Westfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords. Small slabsl could be present in the north and Westfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: SV-átt fram á sunnudag þegar snýst í A-læga átt. Hlýnar á laugardag en kólnar aftur á sunnudag og birtir til. Dálítil úrkoma á mánudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: A thin cover of snow is on top of the older snowwhich was considered stable in general after freeze/thaw cycles.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It snowed a bit on Tuesday and a thin cover of new snow is on top of the older one in some places. The old snow was considered stable. More snow is on SW/W aspects and inland. Small slabs could form during strong SW wind, especially on NE aspects. Little snow at low elevations.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords. Small slabsl could be present in the north and Westfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords. Small slabsl could be present in the north and Westfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: Hvöss SV-átt en dregur úr vindi á laugardag. Bjartviðri á sunnudag en líkur á éljum á mánudag. Það gæti hlánað til fjalla um tíma en kólnar aftur á sunnudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs could be present, especially on S-W aspects.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It snowed a bit this week in strong N-E wind. Wind slabs are likely present, especially on S-W aspects.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords. Small slabsl could be present in the north and Westfjords.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow is widely considered stable but wind slabs are present in the Eastfjords. Small slabsl could be present in the north and Westfjords.

weatherForecast.highlights: V-lægar áttir og bjartviðri um helgina. Líkur á dálítilli snjókomu á mánudag.
